resources.string:
Impactor will unroot and wipe your device, removing root access and all data.
Your apps, files and personal data will be permanently deleted.
The device will be rebooted during the process, and it can take a few minutes, depending on your data size.
This process will return your device back to its factory state.

Impactor will wipe your device, removing data (while preserving root access). Your apps will be erased, and root access preserved. Your media files, such as songs, photos, documents, and media will be preserved.\nThe device will be rebooted during the process, and it can take some minutes, depending on your data size.

Impactor will unroot your device, removing root access.
Your applications and data will be preserved, and root access removed.
The device will be rebooted during the process, and it can take a few minutes.
All superuser binaries and managers will be removed.
Reboot the device to its bootLoader
Boot the device into recovery mode
Your device data (/data and /cache) will be erased and the system will be unrooted
Continuing, the unroot process will start.\nDevice data will not be modified.
Error: Cannot access to external storage
Impactor is unable to read external storage because it has not been granted the permission. Please allow it in the application settings
Unroot in progress.\nProcess can take up to a minute.\nDo not close the application.
Unroot and wiping in progress.\nProcess can take up to a minute.\nDo not close the application.
Data wiping in progress (/data and /cache).\nProcess can take up to a minute.\nDo not close the application.
No root access on this device. You can open the Settings app, search for the wipe menu and confirm the operation
